txt.en: While searching among the remnants of a burned-out Dunlending hut, you discovered a strange sigil. The runes scrawled across it are crude and almost violently hewn.\n\nYou should bring this sigil to Garrun.
'This sigil is strange indeed, [placeholder]. I shall have it sent to Forthbrond to see what they can make of it.'
Within the remnants of a burned-out hut, you found a strange sigil.
Bring the sigil to Garrun in the Isendale

Garrun is at his camp, north along the ridgeline.

You should bring the sigil you found to Garrun.
